div.ab:
بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
هذا براه من عمر بن مرزوق
عامل الأمير شادي بن سعد على مدر ورزم براه لباب
بن بيك إنّك أدّيت إلي ممّا صار عليك من خراج سنة إحدى
وخمسين وخراج خمسين وخراج تسع وخراج ثمان
وأربعين ومائة
وتوابعه من القسم اثنا عشر درهما قبضت
ذلك منك وبرئت إلي منها وكتب في صفر
سنة أربع وخمسين ومائة

bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
hāḏā barāʾaẗ:un min ʿumara bni marzūq:in
ʿāmili ăl ʾamīri šāḏī bni saʿd:in ʿalà madra wa rizma barāʾaẗ:un li bāba
bni bayk:in ʾinna ka ʾaddayta ʾilay ya mimmā ṣāra ʿalay ka min ḫarāǧi sanaẗi ʾiḥdà
wa ḫamsīna wa ḫarāǧi ḫamsīna wa ḫarāǧi tisʿ:in wa ḫarāǧi ṯamān:in
wa ʾarbaʿīna wa miʾaẗ:in
wa tawābiʿi hi mina ăl qisami ĭṯnā ʿašara dirham:an qabaḍtu
ḏālika min ka wa bariʾta ʾilay ya min hā wa kutiba fī ṣafar:in
sanaẗa ʾarbaʿ:in wa ḫamsīna wa miʾaẗ:in

In the name of God, the Merciful and Compassionate.
This is a quittance from ʿUmar ibn Marzūq,
the financial administrator of the governor Shādhī ibn Saʿd, (whose jurisdiction is) over Madr and Rizm, a quittance for Bāb
ibn Bēk. You have delivered to me what you owe with regard to the kharāj for the year
(one hundred and) fifty-one, the kharāj (for the year one hundred and) fifty, the kharāj (for the year one hundred and forty-) nine and the kharāj for the year one hundred
and forty-eight,
and the portions that are linked to it, twelve dirhams. I have received
that from you and you have been released from (the obligation to pay) them to me. It has been written in Ṣafar
of the year one hundred and fifty-four.
